name: BoNtull
description:
BoNtull

This Is A Simple Games That I Made... :3. Simple Yet Challenging... This Game Is Endless... So... It Will Be Good For Time Killer... :3.

How To Play :

- Just Tap And Hold And Swipe Around To Aim The Ball Whenever You Like (Mobile).

- Just Click And Hold And Move Around To Aim The Ball Whenever You Like (PC / Laptop).

This Game Support Device With Touch Input Or Mouse Input.

Hope You Like The Game... :3.

Support Me On Ko-Fi. <3
